name: PUZZLAGON, Multi-Appearance Puzzle Game!!
blurb: 3D Puzzle game for all ages. 3 unique User Interfaces (appearances) so that YOU choose what you're looking at!

rewards.reward: You will be added to the credits in a "Special Thanks" section.

You will be added to the "Mega-Thanks" section of the credits, and you will also get a key chain depicting a random tile from the game (skull, crab).\r\n\r\n* only continental US/Canada for mailed items *

You will be added to the "Mega-Thanks" section of the credits, and you will also get a key chain depicting a random tile from the game (skull, crab). Beyond that you will also recieve a hard copy of a VERY early version of the Skullagon build. \r\n\r\n* only continental US/Canada for mailed items *

You will be in the Credits as a "Monetary Savior", and you will also receive 2 custom painted key chains depicting random tiles from the game ( Fossil skull, Nautilus, Baron skull, Yeti Crab ). You will be given the option of receiving a signed hard copy of a very old build of Skullagon.\r\n\r\n* only continental US/Canada for mailed items *

You will be in the Credits as a "Monetary Savior", and you will also receive 4 custom painted key chains depicting random tiles from the game ( Fossil skull, Nautilus, Baron skull, Yeti Crab ).  You will also be able to name a character in the upcoming game " Gun Monkey ". 

* only continental US/Canada for mailed items *
* character names can't contain profane or vulgar wording *

You will be in the Credits as a "Monetary Savior", and you will also receive a custom CARVED wooden key chain depicting 1 tile of your choice from any PUZZLAGON User Interface. You will also be given the option to recieve either a hand-etched set of 4 drinking glasses (design within reasonable limitations) or to have a custom decorative mask made for you ( you pick colors, we the pick design ).\r\n\r\n* Items can be mailed outside of the US/Canada *

You will get a custom decorative mask, and the option of a 2nd mask or a set of 4 hand-etched drinking glasses. You can get up to 4 key chains of your choice, and you will also get a free, signed  hard copy of the finished game. You will also be added to the 'Ultimate Thanks" section of the credits.\r\n\r\n* Items can be mailed outside of the US/Canada *

You will get a fully customized wall mask (you choose all details from a long list of options), a Mini-boss named after you in the upcoming game "Gun Monkey", and a custom wood-burned clock. You will also be added to the 'Ultimate Thanks" section of the credits.\r\n\r\n* Items can be mailed outside of the US/Canada *

You will be added to the 'Ultimate Thanks" section of the credits, in a bold / italicized font.\r\nYou will also be given THE android tablet that we are testing the game on (Galaxy Tab 2, 10.1")  which will have a copy of the game pre-installed on it. You get to name the Final Boss of the upcoming game 'Gun Monkey", and you will be given the option of having your picture added to the credits.
